committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution denouncing the planned American Nazi Party march in Skokie, Illinois.

summary.text: Declares that the Congress denounces the planned American Nazi Party march in Skokie, Illinois, as an affront to American Jews and an act that deserves the fullest condemnation. Extends the sympathy and support of the Congress to the citizens of Skokie and to all American Jews.

titles.title: A resolution denouncing the planned American Nazi Party march in Skokie, Illinois.
